rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the garden, ensuring ample natural light and a modern aesthetic.

rooms.name: Modern Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen integrated with dining space. Features energy-efficient appliances and open plan design following Vastu principles by aligning the entrance direction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an adjoining balcony featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, ensuring privacy and abundant natural light. Vastu compliant layout.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with a balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows, designed for relaxation and privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Balcony-adjacent bedroom featuring ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows, aligned with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed for relaxation and privacy, featuring a small balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Functional guest bedroom with a dedicated balcony and abundant natural light ensuring Vastu compliance.

openings.description: Main entry designed to face the north-east direction in compliance with Vastu principles.
Door connecting the living area to the expansive garden.
Access door to the spacious balcony from the master bedroom.
Access door to the balcony ensuring privacy and natural light.
Access door to the balcony with ample space for relaxation.
Access door to the balcony designed for modern comfort.
Balcony access door ensuring each bedroom has its own private outdoor space.

features: Spacious balcony for each bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows
notes.building_norms: Compliant with local building codes and regulations.
